summary: The document is a restricted, formerly secret report from the JFK Assassination System, detailing a 1966 records check on Robert Scheer, a candidate for US Congress. It includes personal details about Scheer and mentions his permit for campaign speaking in Berkeley, California. The document was classified as SECRET and released with deletions on March 7, 1995, as part of the DOD-Affiliated Personnel Incident Investigations.
key_findings: The document pertains to a records check on Robert Scheer, conducted in 1966.
Scheer was a candidate for US Congress in the Spring of 1966 and was issued a permit for campaign speaking in Berkeley, California.
The document was classified as SECRET and was released with deletions on March 7, 1995.
The report was part of the DOD-Affiliated Personnel Incident Investigations.
